content: ever wanted to throw a poké ball at something or someone but didn t want a lawsuit now you can based off the body pattern for my previous pattern for katamaris this pattern works up to a close to life size poké ball 7cm in diameter using dk yarn includes instructions for premier great ultra and master balls of course if you want to fill the thing with rocks before you throw it at anyone i can t stop you you do you man it s a free country pokémon and all related ip belong to game freak and nintendo don t sue me i m penniless as it is
